channel.title: Service on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Service on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Service
item.description: Conference Chair Damiano Spina and I were the general chairs of ADCS 2021 which was held as a virtual seminar series. I will be a program co-chair for ADCS 2022 with Maciek Rybinksi. I was the proceedings chair for WSDM 2019, and CHIIR 2021. Peer Reviewing I have been a PC member for the following conferences and workshops: ADCS 2018 BHCC 2021 CIKM 2017, CIKM 2018, CIKM 2019, CIKM 2020, CIKM 2021, CIKM 2022 ECIR 2021, ECIR 2022, ECIR 2023 EMNLP 2021, EMNLP 2022 SIGIR 2019, SIGIR 2020, SIGIR 2021, SIGIR 2022 SIGKDD 2021 WSDM 2021, WSDM 2022, WSDM 2023 WWW 2022, WWW 2023 I was an area chair for COLING 2022.
